import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' // importing SVG import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN ) }
) const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
